text: Vinson & Elkins LLP (or V&E;) is an international law firm with approximately 700 lawyers worldwide and is headquartered in the First City Tower in Downtown Houston, Texas. The firm has 11 offices in major energy, financial, and political centers worldwide, including Austin, Dallas, Dubai, Houston, London, New York City, Richmond, Riyadh, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Washington, D.C. The firm is currently led by Mark Kelly as Chairman and Scott Wulfe as Managing Partner. Category:American law firms
title: Vinson Elkins
